description:
In this course titled - Remove Fear Of Flying With NLP Techniques by Pradeep Aggarwal , you will learn many simple and powerful NLP and self hypnosis techniques to overcome Aviophobia - The fear of flying in an Airplane.

You will be able to remove those negative blockages from your mind and overcome the phobia of flying.

In this course you will learn-

Lecture 1 : Introduction to the course

Lecture 2:Simple Relaxation Techniques Using NLP

Lecture3:Mind Trigger Techniques For Relaxation

Lecture4:Removing Fear Using Anchoring

Lecture5:Removing fear Using Reverse Spinning Techniques

Lecture6:Circle Of Confidence Technique

Lecture7:Fast Phobia Cure Theater Technique To Overcome Phobia

Lecture8:Review Of All Techniques

Lecture9:Summary Of The Course
title: Remove Fear Of Flying With NLP Techniques
